channel.title: Gobuster on HushKat's Cyber Den
channel.description: Recent content in Gobuster on HushKat's Cyber Den

item.title: SimpleCTF
item.description:
Introduction
#

Hello guys, it has been quite some time since I made a CTF writeup and I figured it’s time to share some of my notes with you. Like many of you, I am a beginner and I am still learning and exploring stuff in cyber security. Just recently I got interviewed by CyberShujaa as I had applied to be a scholar in their program for the Security Analyst path. I am happy to say that I have been shortlisted for the program. As part of the admission process, I was required to try out this beginner-level CTF challenge and I thought it wise to take some notes while solving it. You can find the challenge here.

item.title: Web Enumeration
item.description:
Introduction
#

Welcome to another writeup from a challenge discovered at one of the best learning platforms for hackers HackTheBox. This challenge is part of the Getting Started module and can be found here. It is an excellent starting point for those interested in offensive security or red teaming.

Disclaimer: The content presented in this article is for educational purposes only and does not endorse or encourage any form of unauthorized access or malicious activity.
